DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : - To evaluate tolerability LY2951742 solution injectable formulation ( Part A ) - To measure much LY2951742 lyophilize ( freeze dry ) injectable formulation absorb blood stream long take body get rid compare LY2951742 solution injectable formulation single injection skin ( subcutaneous [ SC ] ) ( Part B ) . Information side effect may occur also collect . Each part study last six month . Participants may enroll one part .
DOC.criteria: Male female healthy participant Have body mass index 19.0 35.0 kilogram per meter square ( kg/mÂ² ) , inclusive Currently smoke excess 5 cigarettes/day
